page.title: 18ROSSINGTON C.E. F/M SCHOOL
page.content: I am a 12 years old girl pupil at St Michael's C.E. F/M School. I wear a school uniform which is grey and maroon. In winter it consists of a grey skirt and a white blouse with a grey or maroon jumper or cardigan and in summer a checked or striped dress. Each day at school we have a religious assembly, mathematics and some form of English lesson. Other subjects studied at different times in the week are Art and Craft, Science, French, Music, Religious Education, History, Geography and Physical Education. We have many special events like plays, concerts, sports days and discoes. Particularly interesting have been School Journeys to London, Whitby and Northumberland, areas we have been studying at school. Each School Journey provides a term's work.
